message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think we can both do better than a 60/40 split. I propose a 60/40 split, but in my favor this time. Let's see if we can agree!
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to account for the declining value. Let's settle for 55/45.
